CustomerSearchConfig.SearchDataSourceQuery: SELECT * FROM c WHERE c._ts >= @HighWaterMark Order By c._ts

AddressSearchConfig.SearchDataSourceQuery: SELECT a.CustomerId, a.Address1, a.Postcode, a._ts FROM a WHERE a._ts >= @HighWaterMark Order By a._ts

ContactDetailsSearchConfig.SearchDataSourceQuery: SELECT c.CustomerId, c.EmailAddress, c.MobileNumber, c.HomeNumber, c.AlternativeNumber, c._ts  FROM c WHERE c._ts >= @HighWaterMark Order By c._ts
